description: Removes duplicate records from data using various strategies including full record comparison, key field matching, custom hashing, and fuzzy matching.

data.info: Data containing potential duplicates. Can be a list of Data objects, single Data object, or JSON string.

dedup_strategy.info: Method for identifying duplicate records: full_record (compare all fields), key_fields (compare specific fields), custom_hash (hash specified fields), or fuzzy_match (similarity-based matching).

key_fields.info: JSON array of field names to use for duplicate detection when using key_fields strategy.

hash_fields.info: JSON array of field names to include in custom hash calculation.

fuzzy_config.info: JSON configuration for fuzzy matching including similarity threshold and comparison fields.

keep_strategy.info: Which record to keep when duplicates are found: first, last, most_complete (most non-null fields), or custom_priority.

priority_fields.info: JSON array of fields to use for custom priority ranking when keep_strategy is custom_priority.

case_sensitive.info: Whether string comparisons should be case sensitive.

ignore_whitespace.info: Whether to ignore leading/trailing whitespace in string comparisons.

include_duplicate_info.info: Include detailed information about duplicate groups in the report.

preserve_order.info: Maintain the original order of records in the deduplicated output.

errors.no_data: No input data provided for deduplication.
errors.empty_data: Input data is empty or contains no records.
errors.invalid_json: Invalid JSON format in input data.
errors.no_dedup_run: Deduplication must be run before accessing this output.
